Class UserDao

  • java.lang.Object
    • war.dao.UserDao

public class UserDao
extends java.lang.Object

    • Method Detail

      • find

        public User find(java.lang.String username)
          throws javax.persistence.NoResultException
        Retrieve the user in the database associated to a username Note: this method is the same as: User loadUserByName(String username)
        Parameters:
        username: - the username of the required user
        Returns:
        the user associated to the given login
        Throws:
        javax.persistence.NoResultException - if the search didn't return any result

      • getPeople

        public java.util.List<User> getPeople()
        Retrieve the list of all the users in the Database
        Returns:
        the list of all the users in the Database

      • loadUserByName

        public User loadUserByName(java.lang.String username)
                    throws javax.persistence.NoResultException
        Retrieve the user in the database associated to a username Note: this method is the same as: User find(String username)
        Parameters:
        username: - the username of the required user
        Returns:
        the user associated to the given login
        Throws:
        javax.persistence.NoResultException - if the search didn't return any result

      • performQueryAndCheckResultList

        private java.util.List<User> performQueryAndCheckResultList(javax.persistence.Query query)
        Perform a query and check the result list is of the right type
        Parameters:
        query: - the query to execute
        Returns:
        the list of users returned by the query and checked

      • save

        @Transactional
public User save(User user)
          throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Save a user in the Database. It adds a new user or update an existing user
        Parameters:
        user: - the user to save
        Returns:
        the saved user
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
